segments.text: I see the woman standing at the sink, completely immersed in her task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t help but notice the water spilling over the edge of the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s almost mesmerizing, watching the water cascade down the cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Why doesn’t she notice? Doesn’t she feel her foot getting wet?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The contrast between her calm demeanor and the chaos unfolding is striking.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the boy on the rickety stool, reaching for the cookie jar with laser focus.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He looks like he’s on a daring mission, but it’s so dangerous!
segments.speaker: PAR
